verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Look all around you, find someone in need, Help somebody today! Tho' it be little--a neighborly deed-- Help somebody today!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Help somebody today, Somebody along life’s way; Let sorrow be ended, the friendless befriended, Oh, help somebody today!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Many are waiting a kind, loving word, Help somebody today! Thou hast a message, O let it be heard, Help somebody today!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Many have burdens too heavy to bear, Help somebody today! Grief is the portion of some ev'rywhere, Help somebody today!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Some are discouraged and weary in heart, Help somebody today! Someone the journey to heaven should start, Help somebody today!
